means: 有多种学问、技能或职业的

sentence.Network_en: He is sparkling and versatile in front of the camera.
sentence.Network_cn: 镜头前的他光彩照人，多才多艺。

sentence.Network_en: Never before has computing been so versatile.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算机的用途从没像现在这么广泛过。

sentence.Network_en: He's a versatile actor who has played a wide variety of parts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个多才多艺的演员，扮演过各种各样的角色。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'inconstant, fluctuating'): from French, or from Latin versatilis, from versat- 'turned about, revolved', from the verb versare, frequentative of vertere 'to turn'

encyclopedia.content: versatile ['və:sətail] adj. (VERSATILE / verSAtile)基本词义 1. 有多种技能的，多才多艺的，多面的 2. 有多种用途的，多功能的，通用的，万能的 3. 易变的；反复无常的 4. 可四面转动的，万向的 5. 【植物学】锛埢ǚ埏級丁字形的 6. 【动物学】锛埬裰猴級能前后转动的；锛埨コ娲ソ秋級能上下转动的例句 Our purpose here is simply to learn the use of these versatile components. This landscape is insp

entry.tran: 有多种技能的;多才多艺的
entry.def: If you say that a person is versatile, you approve of them because they have many different skills.

example.ex: He had been one of the game's most versatile athletes.
example.tran: 他是这项运动中技术最全面的运动员之一。

entry.tran: 有多种用途的;多功能的
entry.def: A tool, machine, or material that is versatile can be used for many different purposes.

example.ex: Never before has computing been so versatile.
example.tran: 计算机的用途从没像现在这么广泛过。

means.word_mean: 4. competent in many areas and able to turn with ease from one thing to another;
5. able to move freely in all directions;

sentences.sentence: "an owl's versatile toe can move backward and forward"
"an insect's versatile antennae can move up and down or laterally"
"a versatile anther of a flower moves freely in the wind"

auth_sentence.content: Nicola is versatile and can cope with most situations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nicola is versatile and can cope with most situations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nicola is versatile and can cope with most situations.

auth_sentence.content: It could be light, colourful, fun and versatile.
auth_sentence.res_content: It could be light, colourful, fun and versatile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It could be light, colourful, fun and versatile.

auth_sentence.content: The versatile tenderness which marks the...capricious feelings of the populace.
auth_sentence.res_content: The versatile tenderness which marks the...capricious feelings of the populace.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The versatile tenderness which marks the...capricious feelings of the populace.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的

a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vers转+atile→玩得转,有才能的
vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的

adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐

diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能

vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化

means.word_mean: 多才多艺的；多种技能的；多面手的

sentences.en: A versatile person is often good at a number of different things.
sentences.cn: 多才多艺的人通常擅长许多种不同的事情。

jushi.english: A versatile person is one who is good at a number of different things.
jushi.chinese: 多才多艺的人通常擅长许多种不同的事情。
尼龙是一种有多种用途的材料。
